title: Build or Buy
shortDescription: A fairly long and winding discussion, talking about the history of the pod and then digging into whether you should build or buy your next internal tool!
longDescription:
Welcome to the Bikeshed Podcast!

This week [Scott](https://scottykaye.com/) and [Matt](https://matthamlin.me/) talk about the history of the pod, and then dig into the main topic for the day: whether to build or buy!
